summary: Build a Hindi-language website for Maa Sharada Construction (construction services in Indore, Madhya Pradesh) showcasing services and providing contact information.
architectural_notes: Business info to display: Maa Sharada Construction (Indore, Madhya Pradesh); phones 7047830463, 9754645191; email dheerajjatav695@gmail.com
Services to highlight: construction site work; house construction with materials; boundary wall construction; home finishing with materials (colored tiles, doors, setri, electrical wiring)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Construction project photo: newly built single-family house exterior in warm daylight (maa-sharada-gallery-01.dim_1200x800.png)
- Construction project photo: boundary wall construction with masonry detail (maa-sharada-gallery-02.dim_1200x800.png)
- Construction project photo: interior tiling work close-up with clean grout lines (maa-sharada-gallery-03.dim_1200x800.png)
- Construction project photo: door and window installation scene, modern finish (maa-sharada-gallery-04.dim_1200x800.png)
- Construction project photo: roof slab centering/shuttering work on site (maa-sharada-gallery-05.dim_1200x800.png)
- Construction project photo: electrical wiring installation in a residential interior (maa-sharada-gallery-06.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Hindi-language marketing website for the construction company “Maa Sharada Construction” with clear sections for: company name, brief introduction, services, and contact details.
Implement a simple navigation and layout (header + sections or separate routes) covering at minimum: Home (overview), Services, and Contact, optimized for mobile and desktop.

Make contact details actionable: phone numbers should be clickable (tel: links), email should be clickable (mailto: link), and location should be displayed clearly in Hindi (optionally include a plain external Google Maps link to Indore, Madhya Pradesh).
Apply a coherent visual theme appropriate for a construction business (consistent colors, typography, spacing, and components) and use it across the entire site.
Add required generated images to the project and render them in the UI as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (e.g., logo in header/footer, hero image in the top section).
Add a documented, reproducible publish workflow that deploys the Maa Sharada Construction website to the Internet Computer and makes it publicly accessible.

Ensure the project’s build output is correctly served after deployment (no broken asset paths, blank page, or missing generated images) and that navigation/scroll-to-section behavior works on the deployed URL.
Add a new "Project Gallery" section to the single-page site to showcase completed construction projects using a responsive photo grid.
Update site navigation (header and footer quick links) to include the new Project Gallery section and ensure smooth-scroll navigation works for it on desktop and mobile.
Ensure the new Project Gallery section matches the existing site theme (spacing, typography, card styles, and hover states) and looks good on mobile and desktop.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Hindi-language business website for Maa Sharada Construction with services overview and contact details (phone numbers, Gmail, location).
Publish/deploy the Maa Sharada Construction website (run build and make it publicly accessible).
Add a project gallery section/page to showcase completed construction projects with photos on the Maa Sharada Construction website.
